Outlook.logoutQuestion: Do you want logout eXo Platform portal?
Outlook.homeOpenPortal: Open the intranet page in a new window
Outlook.homeNoActionsAvailable: No actions are available for this context.
Outlook.saveAttachmentDescription: Here you can save attachments as documents in the intranet.
Outlook.selectAttachmentDescription: Selected attachments will be saved in the target space.
Outlook.commentAttachmentDescription: This message will be posted in the activity generated for the saved attachment
Outlook.selectSaveSpaceDescription: Select the space where attachments should be saved
Outlook.pathInfoSaveDescription: Target folder in space's Documents where your attachments will be saved.
Outlook.savedClickToOpen: Click a file in the list below to open it in teh intranet
Outlook.enterFolderNameAndCreate: Give a name to this new folder and click the Add button.
Outlook.addAttachmentDescription: Attach documents from eXo portal to this message.
Outlook.attachingDocumentsDescription: These documents will be attached to the message if checked
Outlook.addedAttachment: Documents successfully attached to your message
Outlook.addedPartiallyAttachment: Some document(s) are not attached to the message, see details below the file
Outlook.convertToStatusDescription: This message can be converted to a post in the activity stream. By default, it will go as a status update in your user stream. Choosing a target space will generate the activity in the space's stream.
Outlook.activityTargetSpaceDescription: If selected, your message will be saved in the space's activity stream.
Outlook.activityTitleDescription: This will be a title of your activity in the stream
Outlook.activityTextDescription: This will be displayed in the activity's body on the stream
Outlook.convertToStatusError: Error converting the message to an activity
Outlook.convertedToUserActivity: The activity was successfully posted in your personal activity stream
Outlook.convertedToSpaceActivity: The activity was successfully posted in {SPACE_NAME} space
Outlook.convertToWikiDescription: This message can be converted to a wiki page. By default, it will be a page in intranet wiki. Choosing a target space will create a page in the space wiki.
Outlook.wikiPageTitleDescription: This will be a title of your wiki page
Outlook.wikiPageTextDescription: This text will be a content of your wiki page
Outlook.wikiTargetSpaceDescription: If selected, your message will be converted to a page in the space wiki.
Outlook.convertedToUserWiki: The page was successfully created in intranet wiki
Outlook.convertedToSpaceWiki: The page was successfully created in {SPACE_NAME} space wiki
Outlook.convertToForumDescription: This message can be converted to a forum topic. You need choose a target space, where it will be created in the space forum.
Outlook.forumTopicNameDescription: This will be a name of your forum topic
Outlook.forumTopicTextDescription: This will be a content of your forum topic
Outlook.forumTargetSpaceDescription: Your message will be converted to a topic in the space forum.
Outlook.convertedToUserForum: The topic was successfully created in intranet forum
Outlook.convertedToSpaceForum: The topic was successfully created in {SPACE_NAME} space forum
Outlook.postStatusDescription: Post a status in the activity stream. By default, it will go as a status update in your activity stream. Choosing a target space will create an activity in the space's stream.
Outlook.activityMessageDescription: This will be displayed as your status in the activity stream
Outlook.postedToUserActivity: Your activity was successfully posted in your personal activity stream
Outlook.postedToSpaceActivity: Your activity was successfully posted in {SPACE_NAME} space

messages.folderHasNoPath: Error selecting folder - path not found. Try to reload the page.
messages.fileHasNoPath: Error selecting file - path not found.
messages.nothingSavedTryAgain: Nothing was saved. Please submit the form again or contact your administrator.
messages.gettingTokenError: Error getting access token for mail server
messages.attachmentNotSelected: No attachment selected. Check at least one and then submit the form again.
messages.menuNameUndefined: Menu name undefined. Please contact your administrator.
messages.youDontHaveSpaces: You are not a member of any space.
messages.messageIdNotFound: Cannot find ID for current message
